string.value: Putting the Legend to a Test
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he has something else he wants to say about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

He says to hunt 30 #rStumps#k in order to test the bow first.

He says you can easily find them in #b#m101040000##k as well as in #b#m102010000##k.

Let's report back to #b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k upon completion.
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k wants to know more about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3500 Able to proceed to 'Revival of the Demon' as next quest.

Once upon a time, there was a demon in #bHenesys#k that played music so loud that the townspeople went deaf. But one brave man in #bHenesys#k made a weapon to defeat the demon, #rSolomon's Bow#k. According to legend, the person who made the bow was a king, but I'm not sure if that's true.

The brave man defeated and sealed the demon in the bow before he died. It's incredible to see this bow in person.

Oh, the one that #b#p1020000##k claims to have seen when he was a kid? Ah, don't sweat it, that's just a toy bow!

Shall we put it to test?
For the time being, I've done some work to the Bow for immediate use.\n\nWhy don't you try hunting 30 #rStumps#k? We'll see how strong this bow really is.
That was quick! Was the bow that strong?
That's it? It's not that strong then.\n\nOh? It said it had a special ability in something else? Are you telling me that this is a talking bow? How incredibly strange.
